text:
If you’re an early-stage B2B SaaS company, don’t give up on content marketing.

This is because it works and it's a viable way to get high-quality traffic, leads, and signups for years to come.

Of course, the competition is becoming tougher by the day. But you can still win even if you’re a greenhorn.

Here's one thing you must know...

To win at content marketing as an early-stage B2B SaaS company, you must be strategic and think outside the box.

That's your competitive advantage!

*The good news is…*

I’ve done all the hard work, and analyzed what the successful early-stage B2B SaaS companies are doing to get results.

And I’ll be sharing them in a forthcoming webinar on 27th October.

To register for the webinar, click the link below right now.

<https://lu.ma/ycmwebinar>

attachments.title: How a Bootstrapped B2B SaaS Grew From 0 to 250,000 Monthly Visitors (In 8 Months) - Zoom

text:
Casted is hosting a virtual event next week tackling the challenges of modern-day content marketing. We'll cover:
• The challenges of modern-day content marketing 
• How brands like HubSpot, Drift, Gong, PayPal, Caterpillar, and more are reshaping the way we create and amplify content
• Live panel and Q&A with IBM, Caterpillar, and PayPal
• On-demand content from brands like HubSpot, Gong, Salesforce, Drift, and more 
• Added bonus: who doesn't love a good twilight zone themed event for spooky season :ghost:?? 
We'd love to see you there! You can check it out here:  <http://www.theamplifyexperience.com|www.theamplifyexperience.com>
